content: Compared to the prior fiscal year period, NTICâs consolidated net sales increased 31.3% in fiscal 2022 to an annual record and grew 30.5% in the fiscal 2022 fourth quarter, because of the positive trends Patrick reviewed in his prepared remarks and the incremental sales from ZERUST India, a 22% decrease in fourth quarter sales across our global joint ventures drove an 8% decrease in fourth quarter joint venture operating income compared to the prior fiscal year period.
